name: KinsokuHangTypes
shortdesc: Hanging punctuation options when a kinsoku set is in effect.

property.name: KINSOKU_HANG_REGULAR
property.shortdesc: Enables hanging punctuation and allows punctuation marks to be placed on or outside the text frame but allows burasagari characters to hang as little as possible. Note: Differs for justified and nonjustified text. For information on justification, see line alignment.

property.name: KINSOKU_HANG_FORCE
property.shortdesc: Enables hanging punctuation but forces hanging punctuation outside the text frame and does not allow the punctuation to be placed on the text frame.
